content.raw: Awesome, thanks for looking into the Mozilla approach. I think that adding a parameter is a good idea, but it can be tricky to keep it API/ABI compatible, so we'd have to go through a deprecation cycle... Maybe a less intrusive option could be to add something like an `URI.Encoding()`flag which allows setting the encoding type, or maybe just a static `URI.Encode()` function could also get the job done.
